❗ MAKE SURE TO RELOAD ALL YOUTUBE PAGES UPON INSTALLING THIS EXTENSION. WORKS BEST ON MODERN YOUTUBE UI.

A true YouTube AdBlocker. You will never need to watch YouTube Ads with this extension.

YouTube AdBlocker will save your time by immediately skipping any ads that play. It works under the cover automatically without any user input!

✅ Fast
✅ Automatic
✅ Lightweight
✅ Undetectable

If YouTube AdBlocker stops working, please submit a Support ticket or join our Discord Server (https://discord.gg/K8hgFHWeJQ).
